item.title: Starbucks scraps $250,000 cap on boss's use of company jet
item.description: The coffee chain changes Brian Niccol's travel budget due to media attention and "credible threat actors".

item.title: During heated hearing, Rubio insists US action in Venezuela will lead to prosperity and security
item.description: The US Secretary of State remained robustly on message when asked about the legality of Maduro's removal, plans for oil sales, and the future of Venez...

item.title: Assisted dying bill 'no hope' of passing unless Lords change approach, warns peer
item.description: Lord Falconer said the bill has "absolutely no hope" of passing without a "fundamental change" in approach.

item.title: Luiz returns to Villa to ease midfield injury woes
item.description: Douglas Luiz returns to Aston Villa from Juventus, following a loan spell at Nottingham Forest, to boost Unai Emery's midfield after Youri Tielemans i...

item.title: Campaigners upset over errors in learning disability deaths report
item.description: A review had found that 39% of deaths with a known cause had been avoidable. The figure has now been revised to 40%.
